title: cant patch and go to legacy client
body:
i cant go to legacy client. and in the new client the play button is grayed out.
always problem happening T_T                                                                                                     {{item:3070}}

replies.body: This could be a permissions issue with your OS blocking the patcher from launching.  Start off with the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to troubleshoot and restore that access.  Let me know if you have any questions on this.
